text: It s been seven years The first time I tried killing my self was seven years ago today  I was out drinking with friends at one of their houses  and we had a massive falling out  The feeling of losing my friends  combined with all the other terrible feelings I had over the course of eighteen years at that point just was too much  Like I had wanted to do so for a while  and it just felt like the time  I tried hanging myself in my friend s closet but they stopped me   I remember going to the hospital  my parents being notified  my mom getting there as fast as she could  Everyone looked so sad  so surprised that this could happen  It hurt a lot because no one noticed before  At the time of me posting this I remember that I was sitting in with a psychiatrist who was telling me I had to go to a hospital for a while because I was a danger to myself  I kept begging and pleading for that not to be the case  I ended up spending a week alone  in a place where the was no doors  everyone watching me  and I couldn t have shoes  or a belt  or anything to hurt myself  I got cigarettes that I had at break once a day  and I don t remember eating really  I think there was spaghetti once but I kinda blocked a lot out   Last night I had a really bad flashback to this  I guess it was a lot more traumatic than I first thought  I feel like I m still really broken  I m not sure how to fix it  I wish I wasn t  I feel like people still don t notice either and that hurts  I was told numerous times that because I tried it once I m some percentage more likely to try it again  and I do feel like people walk on eggshells with me over it but like no one asks really  or seems to care why or what the feelings are   Idk  I m not sure what this post is about  I m just screaming into the void again
summary: It's been seven years since the first time I tried killing my self. I was out drinking with friends at one of their houses and we had a massive falling out. They stopped me from hanging myself in the friend's closet. I spent a week alone in a place where the was no doors and everyone watching me.
cleaned: year time try kill self drink friend house massive falling stop hang friend closet spend week place no door watch

text: feeling so aloneMy girlfriend left me for someone else  This alone makes me feel incredibly low  She was the love of my life  I made her everything to me  She was my motivation  But during all that time I forgot about myself  I forgot how to love myself  I used to be happy  I used to like who I was  But i have no one now  She was my only friend  I cant talk to her because she doesnt care anymore  she just gives emotionless standardized responses  which makes it worse  I have no one to talk to  I feel like I cant connect with people anymore  I have no real friends  I dont see the opportunity that i used to see in talking to someone  it just seems pointless  everyone seems  to only be looking out for themselves  I live in the city and there are so many people  but I am so  alone  I used to feel like I could contribute to the world  I want to help people  But I am so timid and in this world we are forced to be independent  I dont know what to do

cleaned: girlfriend leave feel low no real friend want help people shy not know live big city

text: I just want to Give Up on my Life but I m Confused As Well To be Honest It s like I want to give up on my Life but I don t want to Leave my Brothers Behind if that Makes Sense   Part of me Tells me I wouldn t be Missed the other part says they would miss me but would my Brothers actually Miss me  It just feels like I m falling deeper and deeper into a Pit of wanting to end the Pain as much as I d Miss Them the Palin s unbearable and There s to much Drama going on its really hard   I wouldn t be Surprised if no one sees this which is Fine I don t Expect much out of my Life I feel like my Life isn t going to ever Get Better It s Sad  I m always Dragged into Drama the Stress triggers my Anger Issues to the Point I lash out on these People who cause Drama making me look like a Jerk  Anyways if I do go through with this and my Brothers Friends see this Goodbye Love Y all   For the Strangers Seeing this Goodbye May you have a Good Life better than I had same for my Bros and Friends
summary: I want to give up on my Life but I don't want to leave my Brothers behind. If I do go through with this and my Brothers and their friends see it, they will miss me more than I would miss them.
cleaned: want life not want leave brother brother friend miss miss

text: Me and my mom agreed that we d permanently stay away from each other s phone So  recently my mom put a password on her phone  and this kinda pissed me off  Because every time I change my password she makes me tell her it  So I m like  tell me your password  She straight up told me no So I told her that she s not allowed to know my passwords anymore  She said she was my mother  I told her it s only fair  We argued a bit and eventually she got sick of my bitching and was like  Okay  I won t go in your phone  so don t go on mine
summary: My mom put a password on her phone. Me and her agreed not to talk to each other on each other's phones. She made me tell her her password every time I change my password. Eventually, she got sick of my bitching and told me to not talk to her on my phone.

text: I ve lost controlI wrote my suicide note last night  I didn t kill myself but I know that the note is there for whenever I choose to do it   I ve cut myself so deep that I ve needed stitches almost every day this past week  but it s the only thing that I look forward to each night  I just feel as if I don t exist anymore   my family  although they re tried to be supportive  have just made me feel worse over the few months  but outside of them I don t talk to anyone  They ve just cut me off The more I cut the more severe it gets and it s getting to a point where I want it to be fatal  I know I should get to a hospital but I have exams in a week  and if I fail them then I know it ll all just get worse   If I had the means to kill myself   then I would
summary: The more I cut, the more severe it gets and I want it to be fatal. I have exams in a week and if I fail them, it will only get worse. If I had the means to kill myself, I would.
cleaned: cut severe get want fatal exam week fail bad mean kill
